body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, dentist. Maryland native. Married to Emily B. Moffat Griffith. Father of Ellen C. Griffith, Emma G. Griffith, and Samuel C. Griffith. Dentist in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned five enslaved persons in Louisville in 1850. Dentist in Louisville in 1858. Dentist in Louisville in 1860. Hired one enslaved person in Louisville in 1860. Household owned an additional enslaved person in Louisville in 1860. Dentist in Louisville in 1861. Dentist in Louisville in 1865.
